title: Ground News - British Association: Anti-Muslim incidents have worsened since October 7
text: British Association: Anti-Muslim incidents have worsened since October 7 London: Tell MAMA, which monitors anti-Muslim incidents on British soil, said on Thursday that acts of hatred towards Muslims in the Summary by القدس العربي [United Kingdom](https://ground.news/interest/united-kingdom)have “tripled” since October 7. In a statement, the association stated that 2100 cases of attacks against Muslims have been recorded in the country. She pointed out that this number is considered the highest number [...] 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] القدس العربي British Association: Anti-Muslim incidents have worsened since October 7 London: Tell MAMA, which monitors anti-Muslim incidents on British soil, said on Thursday that acts of hatred towards Muslims in the United Kingdom have “tripled” since October 7. In a statement, the association stated that 2100 cases of attacks against Muslims have been recorded in the country.
